00021 namespace boost {
00022 namespace xint {
00023 
00036 int compare(const integer &b1, const integer &b2, bool ignoresign) {
00037     b1._throw_if_nan();
00038     b2._throw_if_nan();
00039 
00040     if (!ignoresign) {
00041         int sign1=b1.sign(), sign2=b2.sign();
00042         if (sign1==0 && sign2==0) return 0;
00043         if (sign1==0) return -sign2;
00044         if (sign2==0) return sign1;
00045 
00046         if (sign1 != sign2) return sign1;
00047         if (sign1 < 0) return compare(-b2, -b1, ignoresign);
00048     }
00049 
00050     const detail::data_t *b1data=b1._get_data();
00051     const detail::data_t *b2data=b2._get_data();
00052 
00053     int answer=0;
00054     if (b1data->mLength != b2data->mLength) {
00055         answer=((b1data->mLength < b2data->mLength) ? -1 : 1);
00056     } else {
00057         for (int x = int(b1data->mLength) - 1; x >= 0; --x) {
00058             if (b1data->digits[x] != b2data->digits[x]) {
00059                 answer=((b1data->digits[x] < b2data->digits[x]) ? -1 : 1);
00060                 break;
00061             }
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     return answer;
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool operator!(const xint::integer &num1) { return num1.sign()==0; }
00069 bool operator==(const xint::integer &num1, const xint::integer &num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)==0; }
00070 bool operator!=(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)!=0; }
00071 bool operator<(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)<0; }
00072 bool operator>(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)>0; }
00073 bool operator<=(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)<=0; }
00074 bool operator>=(const xint::integer& num1, const xint::integer& num2) { return xint::compare(num1, num2)>=0; }
00075
